TopicTitle: Does anyone know a mod that can do this?

Articles.Content:
Hello, i was just wondering if there was a mod that could bulk edit names of craft also the icon type. Icon type meaning, probe, science, debris, ect.

Thank you!

I'm not sure what you mean by "bulk edit", and whether you want to edit vessels in flight or saved VAB vessels.

Craft Manager can do VAB renaming one at a time: click the file, type new name. It's faster than loading a saved craft, changing the name, saving the new name, then deleting the original name.

Tracking Station Evolved can rename craft in flight and change their type from the tracking station view. It's faster than taking control of every craft.

Neither mod allows a bulk edit with wildcards.

Edited May 16, 2021 by DeadJohn

Yes, try Tracking Station Evolved. Let’s you edit vessel names and icons from the tracking station, as well as filter craft by their types or by what body they orbit, etc. 

This works in 1.11.2 without issues.
